title: Sixty Feet Below
description: Racing against time, Mike Nelson attempts a risky rescue of a test pilot trapped in his plane's cockpit 60 feet below the ocean's surface.

title: Flooded Mine
description: Mike travels 1500 miles inland to a flooded mine where two men are trapped in a foul air pocket. He reaches them, but his dilemma is that there is only enough air in his tank to rescue the miners one-at-a-time and not enough air in the pocket for the remaining man to survive until he returns with more air. Who will go? Who will stay? How will he decide?

title: Rapture of the Deep
description: While testing the skills of two divers, Mike is attacked by one of them, whom is suffering from rapture of the deep.

title: Mark of the Octopus
description: Mike is asked to investigate when two underwater geologists disappear, one of whom washes up on the beach with marks of a struggle with a gigantic octopus.

title: The Sea Sled
description: Mike Nelson rescues an unidentified girl from drowning. The Immigration Department suspects she's an illegal alien and releases her in Mike's custody.

title: Female of the Species
description: Although Kay Dalton is terrified of the sea, she is determined to dive for a cache of stolen diamonds.

title: Mr. Guinea Pig
description: An old flame comes back into Mike's life, and she's nothing but trouble.

title: Sonar Queen
description: Mike has been hired to test a machine dubbed "the fish-finder" on an experimental boat called The Sonar Queen, in hopes of determining why all of the fish have disappeared from the coast of a Mexican fishing village.

title: Gold Below
description: Mike comes to the aid of a young friend, whom has been fooled into working for a couple unsavory treasure hunters.

title: Recovery
description: Mike searches the ocean bottom for a gone-astray nose cone.

title: Killer Whale
description: Mike hunts down a killer whale that has been terrorizing a local coastal community.

title: Midget Submarine
description: Mike pilots a mini-submarine in an attempt to rescue a Russian scientist defector from a ship, where he is being held by his Soviet kidnappers.

title: The Shark Cage
description: Nelson is hired to study shark behavior at various depths and the effects of a new shark repellent.In Caribbean waters and with two other divers assisting him,he is lowered in a shark "cage" to accomplish the assignment.Before it is all over Mike is reminded that human beings also pose a danger to his life.

title: Hard Hat
description: Nelson,brought to the Latin American port of Santa Pueblo,investigates a recently found German WWII submarine.The sub,which had been on a secret mission,may contain secret documents or weapons,the remains of top Nazi Party members-or gold! "Hard hat" divers backed by the country's dictator interfere in the exploration.

title: Marvelous Treasure Machine
description: An overly energetic man appears on Nelson's boat and claims to have built a machine which can find shipwrecks by calculating where the shifting of the earth's plates have moved them. After a successful test run, the objective is to find lost barges carrying gold! Oddly, Nelson is more interested in the machine itself.

title: The Poacher
description: Mike assists the authorities in trying to apprehend a poacher operating in the swamps of Silver Springs, Florida.

title: Girl in the Trunk
description: Mike has serious concerns regarding a dangerous, underwater, carnival magic act.

title: The Sponge Divers
description: Mike comes to the aid of a young diver - in more ways than one.

title: Diamond River
description: Mike Nelson accepts a job to supervise a diving expedition for diamonds in South America, but soon rebels against his employers.

title: Alligator Story
description: Mike Nelson goes after a vicious alligator that escapes from a wild-animal show in Silver Springs, Fla. and takes refuge in the lake in a public park.

title: Magnetic Mine
description: Mike Nelson learns of a derelict mine which has drifted into a California harbor.

title: Underwater Patrol
description: Mike Nelson is called in by the Florida State Police to help solve a series of underwater crimes.

title: Legend of the Mermaid
description: Mike investigates the legend of a mermaid located in an underwater cave off the west coast of Florida.

title: Pressure Suit
description: A professor and his daughter hire Mike Nelson to help them search for a rare underwater plant in Costa Rica.

title: The Prospectors
description: Two prospectors (one of whom is at times violently paranoid about being cheated) ask Nelson to join them in a search for uranium deposits in a river bottom. When after two futile weeks Nelson finally has a positive reading on his Geiger counter, the paranoid partner snaps and lets his suspicions get the better of him.

title: The Hero
description: To fund research for an "ocean plants into food products" project, Nelson agrees to travel to Puerto Blanco/South America. There he teaches skin diving to a thrill seeking millionaire hunter and his wife. The boorish hunter wants to kill a large shark and a giant squid for his trophy case. An accident quickly matures the man.

title: Underwater Station
description: Mike discovers a kidnapped scientist being held in an underwater prison cell.

title: The Lost Ones
description: Offshore near Santa Barbara,Nelson is testing a sea "scooter". Meanwhile,a know-it-all ex-athlete and his wife are spending the day at the beach with their two kids. The kids are carelessly allowed to explore the area and end up trapped in a cave which high-tide will engulf. Nelson and his scooter attempt to be of help.

title: Capture of the Santa Rosa
description: Mike attempts to rescue a kidnapped Latin American diplomat being held with his wife at sea on his pleasure boat named Santa Rosa.

title: The Shipwreck
description: An unexpected storm capsizes a boat.

title: The Big Dive
description: A stuntman tries to break the world's skin-diving record.

title: The Birthday Present
description: Hoodlums attack Mike after he explores the waters around a pier.

title: Dead Man's Cove
description: Mike tries to prove that a woman's drowning was not accidental.

title: Killer Rock
description: Mike is hired to make a molehill out of an underwater mountain.

title: The Amphibian
description: While underwater, a member of Mike's supervised diving party goes missing.

title: Lord Cristobal
description: Mike's life is targeted for murder during his insurance investigation of a sunken ship.

title: Decoy
description: Mike investigates reports of a sea monster, which is literally causing whales to leap into the air above the ocean's surface.

title: The Sea Has Ears
description: Mike searches for the divers who are tapping top secret telephone communications along an underwater cable.

title: The Manganese Story
description: Mike battles rough weather, sharks, bullets, and even a giant clam, as he searches for a deep-water manganese deposit, which could be invaluable to the U.S. Government.

title: The Alcatraz Story
description: Mike is hired by three brothers who want him to teach them how to Scuba dive.

title: Operation Greenback
description: Mike unwittingly becomes involved in the preparation of an underwater bank robbery.

title: Underwater Security
description: Mike battles saboteurs, while conducting an underwater security check for a rocket fuel plant.

title: Underwater Labyrinth
description: Mike battles spies in an underwater maze of caves.

title: Monte Cristo
description: A movie producer hires Mike Nelson to help in filming an underwater escape scene in "The Counte of Monte Cristo". Mike's problems include a reckless movie star and a jealous stand-in.

title: The Stunt
description: A woman, who is willing to do anything she can to win, challenges Mike to an underwater race, as a publicity stunt.

title: Diving for the Moon
description: Mike Nelson is called in on a space project and commissioned to experiment underwater with four top candidates for space travel.

title: The Search
description: Mike Nelson and three of his students search for a missing diver, who was dragged deep below the surface by a large fish that he speared.

title: Jettisoned
description: Mike conducts an emergency covert search in foreign waters to recover a nuclear warhead ditched by a U.S. Air Force plane. A local fishing boat interferes.

title: Murder at Sixty Feet
description: A beautiful millionairess who was crippled by a mountain climbing accident has her husband and doctor recommend scuba diving as therapy for her legs. Nelson is hired to work with her. The husband has an ulterior motive and it involves the strong currents at 60 feet below Drakes Head on the Pacific Coast.

title: Air Pockets
description: Mike conducts a desperate search for survivors soon after a freighter sinks to the bottom of a river in the city of New York. He finds two trapped men and a dog named Tiger surviving in an air pocket. He must quickly find a way to save the men - and Tiger, too.

title: The Dam
description: Mike investigates sabotage of a turbo-electric dam located in a desert area of a small country.

title: Dock Fire
description: Mike takes on a possible suicide mission, when he agrees to swim with a fire hose through an underwater intake pipe into a burning warehouse filled with combustible chemicals.

title: The Persuaders
description: Nelson passing on an invitation to enjoy a break at Catalina Island instead decides to do some needed maintenance work on his boat. However,he is "hired" at gunpoint to retrieve narcotics 60 feet down on the lee side of Rogers Island. Certain he will be killed upon completing the job, Nelson tries to figure a way out.

title: Nerve Gas
description: After discovering a sunken Japanese submarine, the amateur skin diver who found it goes violently berserk.

title: Strange Salvage
description: Mike helps the police investigate the apparent murders of two divers that were searching for a sunken yacht full of treasure.

title: Underwater Survey
description: While looking into the possibility of linking two Latin American lakes by a canal, Mike runs into a group of rebel guerillas.

title: Underwater Curtain
description: While on a research project, Mike encounters saboteur frogmen attempting to destroy the Panama Canal.

title: Hermes
description: A Greek sponge diver and his pretty girlfriend lay a minefield for Mike, fearful that he will interfere with their discovery of a valuable statue on the Mediterranean seabed.

title: The Briefcase
description: Mike searches for a diver who has just stolen a briefcase filled with top secret papers.

title: Cave Diving
description: A geologist, looking for uranium deposits in an underwater cave, is trapped by a landslide.

title: Water Ski Show
description: A champion water-skier drowns during the finale of a water show.

title: Underwater Shrine
description: Mike takes a husband and wife archaeologists on a cave dive.

title: Chain of Evidence
description: While on a diving assignment in a foreign country, Mike Nelson unwillingly becomes involved in proving that the country's military ruler is guilty of murdering a member of the opposition party.

title: Treasure Hunt
description: Shortly after a skin diver steals lobsters from an old fisherman as part of a secret club initiation, he disappears. Mike Nelson finds his spear gun near the lobster pots and the fisherman is accused of murder.

title: Sea Serpent
description: Mike is recruited to search for hidden stolen liquid explosives.

title: The Getaway
description: Mike attempts to rescue a kidnapped friend.

title: Underwater Ejection
description: When a nosecone's capsule fails to eject after landing in the ocean, Mike attempts to locate it and rescue the scientist trapped inside.

title: The Female
description: A female diving student plots revenge after Mike kicks her out of his diving class.

title: Port Security
description: Mike Nelson is on assignment to locate narcotics hidden below the waterline of vessels in the harbor.

title: Underwater Park
description: While conducting a visual and photographic survey for a State underwater park, Mike becomes a target for murder.

title: Underwater Unit
description: Mike takes part in a daring rescue mission of a woman held prisoner by foreign forces.

title: Proof of Guilt
description: Mike risks his life to catch pearl thieves off the coast of Hawaii.

title: Chained
description: Mike helps to bust up a murderous alien-smuggling ring.

title: Ransom
description: Mike gets involved in recovering stolen six valuable computer memory tapes, which are being held for ransom.

title: Oil Island
description: Mike attempts to free a salvage diver trapped under a tremendously heavy piece of deck cargo.

title: Base of Operations
description: Mike attempts to rescue a couple inexperienced divers from the deep.

title: Kelp Forest
description: A deep sea fisherman and his son arm and plant a World War II mine in an attempt to destroy a kelp harvester.

title: The Raft
description: Mike takes on a dangerous mission: Detonating explosives that are stored inside a sunken ship.

title: Asylum
description: Mike takes on the dangerous task of rescuing a political refugee, who is in an embassy and hiding from a Latin American dictator.

title: Water Nymphs
description: Mike battles a murderous style pirate, while working in the Bahamas as an underwater photographer for a famous bathing suit designer.

title: Mr. Big
description: With the use of an underwater camera fitted with a periscope lens, Mike helps agents round up members of an organized crime syndicate.

title: Hot Cargo
description: Mike takes command of the first underwater flotilla of the United States Coast Guard Auxillary in search of sunken radioactive cargo.

title: Underwater Drop
description: Mike helps the US Coast Guard in trapping enemy agents that are dropping microfilm canisters in an underwater cave.

title: Cobalt Bomb
description: Mike's assignment: Retrieve a deadly radioactive capsule and restore it to a lead container without exposing himself to gamma radiation that could take his life.

title: Counterfeit
description: Mike's vacation in The Bahamas is interrupted by the US Secret Service. They need him to search for two-million counterfeit dollars stashed at the bottom of the ocean.

title: Missile Watch
description: Mike tangles with enemy frogmen, while participating in a US Navy inspection of an underwater camera cable.

title: Jade Cavern
description: Mike rescues a girl diver who is trying to trace the origin of a jade statue she owns. He joins the search and is rewarded with an attack on his life.

title: Expatriate's Return
description: While on patrol with the U.S. Coast Guard Auxiliary, Mike becomes entangled with an exiled crime boss, who is trying to slip back into the country.

title: Strong Box
description: A thief endangers lives to secure a fortune in gems buried in the safe of a sunken ship.

title: The Fearmakers
description: When a dictator visiting the United States decides to land at a small harbor with almost no advance notice, Mike is called in by the Coast Guard for an underwater security check.

roles.char: US Coast Guard Commander Jack Carter

title: Revolutionary Spoils
description: Mike gets involved with helping foreign revolutionaries overthrow their dictator.

title: Pirate Gold
description: Mike races against time to rescue a 12-year-old boy trapped in an underwater grotto, rigged with explosives.

title: The Living Fossil
description: Mike joins a diving expedition in search of a prehistoric fish thought to be extinct for millions of years.

title: Submarine Explosion
description: Things go terribly wrong for Mike, while he is involved in planting underwater explosives in the ocean's floor.

title: Sacred Pool
description: Mike travels deep into the jungle areas of a small Latin-American country in search of a sacred pool of water and its secrets held within.

title: Cindy
description: Mike attempts a risky rescue of a young girl trapped inside an underwater mine.

title: Cross Current
description: Mike searches underwater for a missing female scientist friend.

title: Synthetic Hero
description: Mike investigates the wreck of a sunken Navy ship.

title: The Cellini Vase
description: Mike becomes suspicious of his employer, whom has hired him to search a three-century-old sunken Spanish galleon.

title: Target
description: After a mysterious radioactive object crashes into the ocean floor, Mike must dive to discover just what it is.

title: Ghost Light
description: While performing experimental underwater research utilizing infra-red light, a diver goes missing.

title: Rebreather
description: Mike takes on a dangerous spy mission while vacationing in the Caribbean.

title: Blind Spot
description: The US Coast Guard enlists Mike's help in determining the cause of sabotage to the radar of the coastal warning system.

title: The Replacement
description: Mike Nelson decides to teach two shark-killing juvenile delinquents a lesson - in catching a live shark.

title: Underwater Beacon
description: Mike investigates a mysterious signal emanating from the ocean's floor.

title: Time Fuse
description: Sabbateurs have rigged a sunken ship with 50 tons of dynamite, and it's Mike's job to diffuse the monstrous time-bomb before it blows up an entire foreign nation's capital.

title: Storm Drain
description: Mike attempts a risky rescue of a young criminal trapped in a storm drain.

title: The Invader
description: Mike is retained by a small Latin American country to train a cadre of underwater demolition experts. Mike and his team spring into action when the country's president is kidnapped.

title: Changing Patterns
description: Mike comes to the aid of his old diving instructor, whom is now getting too old to make dangerous dives.

title: The Catalyst
description: Mike investigates the mysterious drowning death of the inventor of an advanced rebreather device.

title: The Missing Link
description: Mike gets mixed up with two scientists trying to examine fossils from the sea.

title: Underwater Narcotics
description: Mike tangles with divers growing a hybrid form of marijuana under water.

title: The Sound of Nothing
description: Mike searches underwater for enemy scanning devices being utilized to jam American satellite signals.

title: Prima Donna
description: Mike attempts to rescue a movie starlet trapped underwater aboard a ship, which is flooded after a special effects dynamite blast.

title: Beyond Limits
description: The US Coast Guard recruits Mike to search for a missing missile on the ocean floor.

title: Diplomatic Pouch
description: Mike attempts to recover a Top Secret diplomatic pouch lost in hostile foreign waters.

title: Man Overboard
description: Mike investigates the mysterious disappearance of a man gone overboard only a half-mile from shore.

title: Point of No Return
description: As part of a research project, Mike Nelson attempts to spend three days underwater at a depth of 250 feet in a pressure chamber dubbed Scubasphere. A tropical storm pops up, and both the cable and telephone connections attached to the Coast Guard ship above are severed. To make matters worse, the ship heads for safer waters without realizing that Mike has lost his connection to them.

title: River Treasure
description: While in a South American jungle, Mike tangles with a jealous treasure hunter.

title: The Destroyers
description: Mike investigates the mysterious collision of two Navy destroyers.

title: Vital Error
description: Mike's normally level-headed skindiving buddy begins to exhibit peculiar behavior.

title: The Dancer
description: Mike desperately tries to save the life and limb of a popular dancer whose leg is hopelessly pinned in wreckage 90 feet below the surface.

title: Sperling of Lamatsue
description: Mike tries to recover valuable medical supplies that an Asiatic warlord has dumped into the river.

title: Rescue
description: Mike must dive to rescue a friend trapped in a sunken wreck, with just minutes left until explosive charges are set to blow it to pieces.

title: Mercy Ship
description: Mike risks his life in order to sneak badly needed medical supplies through a dictator's mine-infested blockade.

title: Hot Tracer
description: Problems arise as Mike attempts to retrieve a pair of radioactive cylinders leaking dangerous amounts of radiation underwater.

title: Sonar Story
description: Using sonar equipment on his boat, Mike tracks heroin smugglers.

title: Amigo
description: Mike travels to Mexico in search of underwater fossils in an inaccessible cave.

title: The Aquanettes
description: Mike takes part in a special program known as Operation Astronette. His job is to train three female astronauts in underwater survival skills.

title: Survival Kit
description: Mike attempts to salvage a survival kit from a German fighter plane shot down during World War II.

title: Expedition
description: Professor Halliday wants more money to carry on his underwater exploration.

title: Bionics
description: An inventor dies while testing a new underwater detection device.

title: The Defector
description: Mike tells an inept skin-diving pupil that there's no point in continuing his lessons.

title: Niko
description: Mike attempts to diffuse two sunken torpedoes, as well as diffusing the racial tensions between the Japanese and American members of his 3-man team.

title: Cougar
description: Mike and a young man, whom he had helped rehabilitate when he was a juvenile delinquent, fly to Hawaii to hunt for lionfish, one of the most venomous fish on the ocean floor.

title: Sub Hatch
description: Mike and his partner fight the bends, as they endure a long recovery process in a submarine's escape trunk.

title: The Octopus Story
description: Mike and his diving team are attacked by a violent new breed of octopus.

title: Quicksand
description: While searching for a sunken wreck, Mike's hard hat diving partner disappears, leaving nothing behind but his torn air hose attached to their boat on the surface.

title: Lost Island
description: While on a covert mission for the U.S. Government, Mike discovers a few unsavory inhabitants on what was supposedly a deserted island.

title: Baby
description: While in the dangerous jungles of Ecuador, Mike takes desperate measures to save the life of his very ill infant godson.

title: Confidential Mission
description: Mike travels undercover to the Caribbean Coast on a secret mission for the United States Government.

title: Underwater Pirates
description: It's a battle of wits, as Mike tries to outsmart pirates intent on hijacking the cargo of a sunken wreck that he found.

title: The Meet
description: Mike is recruited to track down counterfeiters.

title: Dark Evil
description: While Mike is in Nassau on a salvage job, two of his friends catch and eat a strangely poisonous fish for breakfast, which causes severe hallucinations that trigger suicidal and homicidal tendencies.

title: Sunken Car
description: After being falsely arrested for diving in a bay, Mike sets out to solve a murder mystery.

title: Hit and Run
description: A female diving friend of Mike's is hospitalized with severe injuries sustained by a hit-and-run speedboat piloted by a popular movie star.

title: The Saint Story
description: Mike is recruited to rescue the statue of a Saint who falls off a ship into the sea. The locals believe this is the cause of many problems in the area including the poor fishing.

title: Imposter
description: Mike is suspected of insurance fraud, after an impostor steals a valuable necklace.

title: Superman
description: Mike is invited to join a longtime friend and her workaholic husband on their expedition to explore an Aztec ceremonial pool on an uninhabited island located 15 miles off the coast of Mexico. Mike's friend unwittingly puts her husband's life in jeopardy, when she deliberately strands the trio on the island.

title: Roustabout
description: A South American city's water supply is threatened by a drum of poison from an overturned truck.

title: P.T. Boat
description: While vacationing in Nassau, Bahamas, Mike meets an eccentric multi-millionaire inventor and his sister. He helps the man experiment with an underwater remote control device used to guide boats.

title: Starting Signal
description: Mike battles underwater saboteurs, as he assists the US Navy with underwater sound travel experiments.

title: Skipper
description: Mike investigates the ramming of a Coast Guard boat by a hydroplane piloted by a friend of his during a race.

title: Crime at Sea
description: Mike Nelson sets out to prove that the death at sea of a friend's father was the result of murder.

title: Round Up
description: Underwater explosives threaten to make this Mike Nelson's final dive.
